definition: the first Chinese dialect dictionary, edited by Yang Xiong 揚雄|扬雄[Yang2 Xiong2] in 1st century, containing over 9000 characters

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The research on Pingxiang dialect has great significance.
sentences.chinese: 萍篆方言的研究，意义重大。

sentences.english: Xiangyin Jianzi is a local rhyme dictionary of the Changsha dialect in the early 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 《湘音检字》是一部反映20世纪初长沙方言的韵书。

sentences.english: This article takes the Longhui Dialect as the example, inspecting its certain dialect word meaning.
sentences.chinese: 文章以隆回方言为例，考察其若干方言词义。

sentences.english: This article takes the Longhui Dialect as the example, inspecting its certain dialect word meaning.
sentences.chinese: 文章以隆回方言为例，考察其若干方言词义。

sentences.english: His narrative is a super rendering of dialect speech and idiom.
sentences.chinese: 他的叙述是方言和土语最成功的运用。

sentences.english: The second chapter is the Zhuolu dialect phonetic system.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是涿鹿方言音系概况。

sentences.english: We strongly support education in our own mother tongues.
sentences.chinese: 极力支持争取接受母语方言教育的权利。

sentences.english: With its special location of Yueyang, its dialect is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 岳阳由于其地理位置的特殊性，方言十分复杂。

sentences.english: Starting with researches of Dialect itself, the linguistic thinking of Yangxiong is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 从《方言》本身的研究入手，探讨了扬雄的语言思想。

sentences.english: We work together at my indian dialects .
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起做关于印度方言的工作。

sentences.english: Thus it is more suitable to regard Gan as a sub-category under the Hakka-Gan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 把赣方言看成是客赣语的一个次方言更有其合理性。

sentences.english: Thus it is more suitable to regard Gan as a sub-category under the Hakka-Gan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 把赣方言看成是客赣语的一个次方言更有其合理性。

sentences.english: This article is a comprehensive survey of Xinjin dialect research.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对新津方言的全面调查研究。

sentences.english: "La Jara" is in local dialect the name for "gravel".
sentences.chinese: “拉加拉”是当地方言中的“砂石”。

sentences.english: The compartment regulars between dialect and Mandrain are the important basis of dialect correctness.
sentences.chinese: 方言与普通话语音对应规律是方音辨正的重要依据。

sentences.english: Hengyang dialect and Changsha dialect belong to the same sub-xiang-dialects.
sentences.chinese: 衡阳方言与长沙话同属湘方言的一个次方言。

definition: Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
Wu dialects (spoken primarily in Shanghai and surrounding areas)
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
Min dialects, spoken in Fujian Province, Taiwan etc
Gan dialect, spoken in Jiangxi Province
Suzhou dialect, one of the main Wu dialects 吳語|吴语[Wu2 yu3]
